clients.title: Make Your Attorney Profile Page More Robust
description: Did you know the highest-trafficked page on your law firm site besides your home page is likely your attorney profile page? Many attorneys leave this page bare bones and neglect to include vital and compelling information that can build confidence with clients and prospective clients. Even if you lack years of legal experience, there are plenty of subjects to cover and ways to differentiate yourself. Read more about the importance of this page and what to include.
